org.cmg.resp.policy
Interface IPolicy

All Known Implementing Classes:
NodePolicy
public interface IPolicy

This interface identifies the set of methods that each node policy has to provide.

Author:
Michele Loreti

Method Summary

               int session,
               Tuple tuple)
               throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                      java.io.IOException
This method is invoked when a remote node asks for adding a tuple in the local knowledge repository.

Parameters:
from - remote node
session - operation session
tuple - tuple to add
Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException - is thrown when the current thread is interrupted while it is waiting for action execution
java.io.IOException - is thrown when a communication error occurs
